extension.name: system - EUCookieDirectiveLite
extension.author: Channel Digital.
extension.description: Displays a cookie acceptance banner at the top of the site to warn about the site using cookies.

field.name: width
field.label: Width px (0 = full width)
field.description: The width of the message on the screen. 0 for 100%

field.name: warningMessage
field.default: We use cookies to improve our website and your experience when using it. Cookies used for the essential operation of this site have already been set.
field.label: Warning Message
field.description: The message to display to users

field.name: detailsUrl
field.label: Details URL
field.description: A link to the details page on this site for more information
